oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-10-25 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 25, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performers Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys, and regular performers Fred Smith, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, June Carter, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 994th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Garland; June Carter; Fred Smith; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Grandpa Jones; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Hank Garland -- Old Dan Tucker (Hank Garland) -- Porter Wagoner introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Fred Smith, Porter Wagoner) -- Prince Albert commercial (June Carter, Porter Wagoner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Porter Wagoner introduces Bill Monroe -- Panhandle Country (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Grandpa Jones -- Don't Look Back (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- Dear Lonesome (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Smith, Fred E., 1924-2006; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Wagoner, Porter; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys
